title: About account update
body: Anyone stuck at the account update?I met this problem last week,then I think riot fix it.Now I again met this problem,the endless confirmation between websites.

replies.body: Got same issue here with Google Chrome, I changed to IE and it works, have a try.

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainEevee,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=REhONL7A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-26T11:23:22.689+0000)
>
> Got same issue here with Google Chrome, I changed to IE and it works, have a try.

Than you so much for your advice.The IE works well ,problem solved!!!{{summoner:1}}
I used the Google Chrome to open the link, after you entered the password, it jumped to the username creation pages. Finally leave the F*** cycle!!
me too .endless loop. keep “next” from one page to another, i dont know what should i do know and i cant play this facking game : )
